content: Based on our first-quarter results and trends into the second quarter, we are reaffirming our guidance ranges for the full year of 2022 as follows: total certified loans to be between $195,000 and $225,000; total revenue to be between $210 million and $240 million; adjusted EBITDA to be between $135 million and $160 million; and adjusted operating cash flow to be between $140 million and $165 million. Your line is open. And so the comparable profit share that you’re seeing in the supplemental, the 584 per certified loan on new originations in Q1 of 2022 as compared to the 680 previous year quarter, that has not been taken off yet. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
